original_text: The Pharisees spoke again to the man who had been blind. They said to him, ‘What do you yourself say about this man? It was your eyes he has now made able to see.’ The man replied, ‘He is a prophet.’
korean_text: 이에 맹인되었던 자에게 다시 묻되 그 사람이 네 눈을 뜨게 하였으니 너는 그를 어떠한 사람이라 하느냐 대답하되 선지자니이다 하니

sentences.original_text: to the man who had been blind
What do you yourself say about this man?
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 이 사람에 대해 어떻게 말합니까?

sentences.original_text: he has now made able to see
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 지금 볼 수 있게 만들었습니다
